snippet: No fire burned hotter, no mouth was fouler, no opponent was in for a longer night than Kevin Garnett's....
lead_paragraph: No fire burned hotter, no mouth was fouler, no opponent was in for a longer night than Kevin Garnett's.

headline.main: Kevin Garnett Says 'Farewell' After 21 Seasons in the NBA
headline.print_headline: Kevin Garnett Says 'Farewell' After 21 Seasons in the NBA
